ctx: intros t1 l1 l2 H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: pose proof (subst_pred_ordered_cover_l t1 (node t1) l1 l2 H1) as H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type t1 : btree A l1, l2 : list (btree A) H1 : ordered_cover l1 t1 H2 : length l1 = length l2 The term "node t1" has type "btree A -> btree A" while it is expected to have type "btree A".

ctx: intros t1 l1 l2 H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: pose proof (subst_pred_length t1 (node t1) l1 l2 H1) as H4.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : forall A : Type, btree A -> btree A -> btree A A : Type H : forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> ordered_cover l1 t1 t1 : btree A l1, l2 : list (btree A) H1 : ordered_cover l1 t1 H2 : length l1 = length l2 The term "node t1" has type "btree A -> btree A" while it is expected to have type "btree A".

ctx: intros t1 l1 l2 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A : Type) (l1 : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), cover l1 t -> exists l2 : list (btree A), permutation l1 l2 /\\ ordered_cover l2 t" on hypothesis of type "forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> length l1 = length l2".

ctx: intros t1 l1 l2 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "length l1" in H4.

ctx: intros t1 l1 l2 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: The reference H4 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros t1 l1 l2 H1 H2. pose proof (subst_pred_ordered_cover_l t1 (node t1) l1 l2 H1) as H3. pose proof (subst_pred_length t1 (node t1) l1 l2 H1) as H4. apply cover_ordered_cover in H3. rewrite -> H2 in H4. apply list_length_ind with (l := l1). intros l H5. rewrite <- H4. apply H5.
